thread.title: Vincari adds Dr. Maqbool Patel as Chief Technology Officer in Preparation of Successful Year Ahead Providing ICD-10 Solution for Surgeons
thread.title_full: Vincari adds Dr. Maqbool Patel as Chief Technology Officer in Preparation of Successful Year Ahead Providing ICD-10 Solution for Surgeons

author: admin
title: Vincari adds Dr. Maqbool Patel as Chief Technology Officer in Preparation of Successful Year Ahead Providing ICD-10 Solution for Surgeons
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 9:17 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Vincari 
BIRMINGHAM, Ala., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Vincari , known for Lightspeed Valet, the ICD-10 ready virtual assistant for surgeons , has hired two new management members to prepare for a successful year ahead. Among the hires are Dr. Maqbool Patel as Chief Technology Officer and Hugh Lee as Regional Vice President of Sales. 
Dr. Maqbool Patel - Vincari's New CTO 
Dr. Maqbool Patel (Chief Technology Officer at Vincari) has over 20 years of strategic leadership experience in Healthcare IT. Most recently, Dr. Patel served as the VP of Development at YourCareUniverse (2012-2015), an advanced cloud based solution for integration, population health management, and advanced analytics across millions of patients. Before this he was the VP of Development for Integration and Interoperability and Business Intelligence at MEDHOST where he lead the interoperability and meaningful use (MU) efforts which lead to the successful attestation of MEDHOST clients for MU. Additionally. Dr. Patel was one of the founding members and CTO of Acuitec Inc. (2009-2012), a Preoperative Information Management solution provider acquired by MEDHOST in 2012. Between 1998-2009, Dr. Patel held leadership positions at GE Healthcare , Emageon , CircleSource , TCS , and other premier healthcare companies. He is also the Founding Director and Information Security Officer of the non-profit Red Crescent Clinic of Alabama (RCCA) , a free clinic for indigent patients. Dr. Patel received his PhD from Drexel University in Computer Engineering, and BS and MS in Electrical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore. 
" My decision to join Vincari was an easy one. My association with Vincari ( formerly ComplyMD ) during its formative days gave me an appreciation of the problem Vincari is trying to solve. Above all, the Vincari team is impressive. I am excited that with my extensive experience in Healthcare IT and knowledge of surgery space, I will be able to help Vincari reach new heights ." - Dr. Maqbool Patel, CTO of Vincari 
" The addition of Dr. Patel to the Vincari team emphasizes Vincari's focus and commitment to excellence by recruiting high-performing leaders to drive continuous innovation, performance, HIPAA compliance and security. Maqbool's intense focus and easygoing demeanor make him an excellent cultural fit with our intelligent, hard working team. " - Alston Noah, CEO of Vincari 
Hugh Lee Appointed Regional Vice President of Sales 
Hugh Lee (Regional Vice President of Sales at Vincari) has over 14 years of sales experience in Healthcare Technology. Mr. Lee most recently worked as a National Sales Manager at Perigen after over 10 years with GE Healthcare. Mr. Lee is a key addition to the sales team led by Vincari's Executive Vice President of Sales, Jon Tulloch. 
About Vincari 
Headquartered in Birmingham, Alabama, Vincari helps Hospitals, Surgery Centers and the Physicians who perform surgical procedures to minimize costs, maximize quality and specificity for ICD-10 documentation as well as optimize facility and professional fee reimbursement. The software platform, Lightspeed Valet, is engineered for speed, accuracy, and the ability to anticipate physician needs , learn individual patterns and guide specificity. Lightspeed Valet dramatically improves the entire process related to ICD-10 both upstream at the point of care and downstream for the coding and documentation teams. For more information, visit http://www.vincari.com. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/vincari-adds-dr-maqbool-patel-as-chief-technology-officer-in-preparation-of-successful-year-ahead-providing-icd-10-solution-for-surgeons-300139114.html 
SOURCE Vincari
